Had first career hit on 9/9/1985, off Reggie Patterson (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/22/1986, off Tom Browning (CIN)...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $377,143 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $634,286 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $634,286 through salary arbitration...
6/3/1989: Signed a contract extension with San Diego, $300,000 per year, for 2 years.
8/4/1989: Signed a contract extension with San Diego, $360,000 per year, for 2 years.
Traded from San Diego to Philadelphia on 5/18/1990 (Going to SD: P Jeff Gray, CF F.P. Santangelo. Going to PHI: P Alan Embree, P Lance McCullers, 3B Joey Cora)...
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 2/7/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
